data.name: ARSLAN - GC Online Rsgistration Key
data.detailed_description: "GAMECITY Online User Registration code" is to receive the service or the information from the User's Page of the product.
data.about_the_game: "GAMECITY Online User Registration code" is to receive the service or the information from the User's Page of the product.
data.short_description: "GAMECITY Online User Registration code" is to receive the service or the information from the User's Page of the product.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista® (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 2.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over, High Color
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: VRAM 1GB over, recommend XInput controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista® (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 3.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1980*1080 pixel over, True Color, 16:9 display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes: VRAM 2GB over, recommend XInput controller
